snippet: The authorities said the man, facing drug and weapons charges, was attempting a “frontal assault” on the courthouse in Cumming, Ga., using an arsenal that included an assault rifle and tear gas.
abstract: Dennis R Marx, self-described 'Glock armorer' who took part in gun shows across the South, is shot to death by law enforcement officials after he brings arsenal of weapons and ammunition to the county courthouse in Cumming, Ga; investigators say they believe Marx, who had water and plastic handcuffs in his vehicle, had intended to take control of the courthouse.

byline.contributor: Alain Delaquérière contributed research from New York.

lead_paragraph: The authorities said the man, facing drug and weapons charges, was attempting a “frontal assault” on the courthouse in Cumming, Ga., using an arsenal that included an assault rifle and tear gas.

headline.main: Gunman Attacks Georgia Courthouse and Dies in Firefight, Authorities Say
headline.print_headline: Gunman Attacks Georgia Courthouse and Dies in Firefight, Authorities Say
